title: 关于ILS插件
author: omg_
txt_content: 如何关闭ILS的自然伤害，装了ILS插件后30000血的NPC一摔就死了……

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
ils的摔落伤害是百分比计算的，在配置文件里可以配置
另ils和mod不兼容，如果想问怎么配置发配置文件

replies.author: MC-领主
replies.txt_content:
environmentalDamage:   block_explosion:     damage: 20     durabilityLost: 40   cactus:     damage: 5     durabilityLost: 10   drowning:     damage: 10     durabilityLost: 0   entity_explosion:     damage: 20     durabilityLost: 40   fall:     damage: 12     durabilityLost: 20   fire:     damage: 5     durabilityLost: 10   fire_tick:     damage: 5     durabilityLost: 6   lava:     damage: 20     durabilityLost: 30   lightning:     damage: 25     durabilityLost: 60   magic:     damage: 5     durabilityLost: 3   poison:     damage: 5     durabilityLost: 2   starvation:     damage: 5     durabilityLost: 0   suffocation:     damage: 5     durabilityLost: 0   thorns:     damage: 2     durabilityLost: 4   damage:     durabilityLost: 1
打开配置找到这个修改那个 damage 即可
